FinancialAccountBalance.name: FinancialAccountBalance
FinancialAccountBalance.description: Represents the details about a financial account balance.

Amount.description: The balance amount in the financial account.

BalanceAsOfDate.description: Timestamp for when the balance was last retrieved from an external data source.

FinancialAccountId.description: Financial account related to the balance.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user iewed this record.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of this record in an external system.

Type.description: Specifies the type of balance in the financial account.
